# mvqn/annotations
A semi-complex PHP-Doc Annotation parsing library, specifically designed for use in MVQN projects, but generic enough for anything!

## Installation
Install the latest version with
```bash
composer require mvqn/annotations
```

## Basic Usage
```php
<?php

// COMING SOON
```
